channel.title: Version 5.24 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.24.0 (2024-02-28) Cap'n Hugo 0.112.4 0.112.4 This release requires a newer Cap'n Hugo version. Change Change Th' topbar button received a way t' add text next t' th' ay'con. For this, th' original title opt'n was renamed t' hint while th' new title opt'n be now displayed next t' th' ay'con.
